### Hexo

- Markdown

- emoji

  - vscodeemoji

-

  ```python
  def factorial(n):
    if n=1:
      return 1
    return factorial(n-1)*n
  ```

## NexT
`NexT`  `Hexo` NexTNexT

MistTable of ContentsTOC

## 
### 
1. Hexo `Node.js` 
   - [`Node.js`](https://nodejs.org/en/) - macOS installer
   - `git` - macOS  `homebrew` 
2.  `Node.js`  package manager `npm`
`npm install hexo`

### 
 `Hexo` `<folder>`
```bash
hexo init <folder>
cd <folder>
npm install
```

```
.
.
 _config.yml
 node_modules
 package-lock.json
 package.json
 scaffolds
 source
     _posts
 themes
```

- `_config.yml` - 
  - [](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/docs/configuration)
- `package.json` - 
- `scaffolds` - 
  - Hexo 
- `source` - 
  - 
  -  `_posts`  `_` /
  - Markdown  HTML  `public` 
- `themes` - 

###  NexT 

 `Hexo`  `themes` 
```bash
cd <folder>
# 
git clone https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next themes/next
```
 `<folder>/_config.yml` `theme` 

```yml
theme: next # landscape
```

NexT `_config.yml`

- `<folder>/_config.yml`
- `<folder>/themes/next/_config.yml`

`Hexo`, `NexT`

### 

NexT  (Scheme) 

- Muse - NexT
- Mist - Muse
- Pisces -  Scheme
- Gemini

 Scheme 

```yaml
scheme: Mist #/Muse/Pisces/Gemini
```



```yaml
# Site
title: # 
subtitle: # 
description: # 
keywords: # 
author: # 
language: zh-Hans # 
timezone: # 
```

[Hexo](https://hexo.io/docs/configuration.html)

### 

Hexo  `<folder>/source/_posts/` `hello-world.md` Hexo



```bash
# 
npx hexo generate
# 
npx hexo server
```

HexoHexo`http://localhost:4000/`Hello World

![](hexo-blog/blog_snapshoot.png)

## 



```bash
hexo new <layout> title
```

Hexo`source/_posts/``title.md`layoutpost

- post - 
- page -  
- draft - 

`title.md`Hexo`front-matter`meta-data

```markdown
---
title: #
toc:
  number: #
  enable: #TOC
date: 2020-05-02 18:30:55
tags: # 
categories: # 
permalink: # 
comments: # 
---
```

`front-matter``---`MarkdownemojiHexo`public`

HTML`public`

`hexo generate`

Gitub Pages Github`<example>.github.io``<example>`Github id

`hexo-deployer-git`

```bash
npm install --save hexo-deployer-git
```



```yaml
deploy:
  type: 'git'
  repo: https://github.com/<example>/<example>.github.io.git
  branch: master
```

`<example>`Github id

> `branch`masterGithub Pagesservermaster

Hexo`public`pushmaster

```bash
hexo deploy
```

GithubSettingsGithub Pagesmaster`<example>.github.io`





```bash
hexo clean # public
hexo generate
hexo deploy
```

Hexo

```bash
hexo d -g # 
```
